amendment.description: To limit essential air service locations that average 10 or more enplanements per day.

vote.text: Amendment SA 81 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 81 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S826, S828; text: CR S826) To limit essential air service locations that average 10 or more enplanements per day.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 81 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 81 proposed by Senator Coburn.
